description: Single storey outbuilding in rear garden for use as ancillary home office (following demolition of existing shed).
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and documents: Location Plan (date May 2020), Block Plan (May 2020), Existing Elevations (May 2020), Proposed Elevations (May 2020) and Proposed Plans (May 2020).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or in the approved drawings and documents listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).	 | The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes ancillary to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
